blogPost.title: How do you confront business failures and transform setbacks into opportunities? Answer by @karagoldin, Founder & CEO, @hint. https://t.co/0xIMZXk3Yf https://t.co/s0smSoVFJj
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ビジネスの失敗に立ち向かい、挫折をチャンスに変えるには？Answer by @karagoldin, Founder & CEO, @hint. https://t.co/0xIMZXk3Yf https://t.co/s0smSoVFJj
你如何面对商业失败，并将挫折转化为机遇？回答者：@karagoldin, 创始人& CEO, @hint. https://t.co/0xIMZXk3Yf https://t.co/s0smSoVFJj
你如何面對商業失敗，並將挫折轉化爲機遇？回答者：@karagoldin, 創始人& CEO, @hint. https://t.co/0xIMZXk3Yf https://t.co/s0smSoVFJj

previous.title: How can AI be used to solve real business problems? Answer by @YinglianXie, Co-Founder and CEO of @DataVisor. https://t.co/qjw82AP61q https://t.co/Ihu8dLzK5a

localize.full_text: 実際のビジネス上の問題を解決するために、AIはどのように活用できるでしょうか？答えは、@DataVisorの共同創業者兼CEOの@YinglianXie氏です。https://t.co/qjw82AP61q https://t.co/Ihu8dLzK5a
如何利用人工智能来解决真正的商业问题？回答者：@YinglianXie，@DataVisor的联合创始人兼CEO。https://t.co/qjw82AP61q https://t.co/Ihu8dLzK5a
如何利用人工智能來解決真正的商業問題？回答者：@YinglianXie，@DataVisor的聯合創始人兼CEO。https://t.co/qjw82AP61q https://t.co/Ihu8dLzK5a

next.title: Can artificial intelligence be used to improve flavors in foods? Answer by @RobinLougee, Senior Research Scientist, IBM Research. https://t.co/9MYTQa4EQs https://t.co/NWeFicpJfJ

localize.full_text: 人工知能を使って食品の風味を改善することができるのか？Answer by @RobinLougee, Senior Research Scientist, IBM Research. https://t.co/9MYTQa4EQs https://t.co/NWeFicpJfJ
人工智能可以用来改善食品的味道吗？回答者：@RobinLougee，IBM研究院高级研究科学家。https://t.co/9MYTQa4EQs https://t.co/NWeFicpJfJ
人工智能可以用來改善食品的味道嗎？回答者：@RobinLougee，IBM研究院高級研究科學家。https://t.co/9MYTQa4EQs https://t.co/NWeFicpJfJ
